name: RoPuzzle
description:
ROPUZZLE  INTRO

ROPUZZLE GAME IS SOLVE PUZZLES GAME WHERE PLAYER MUST FIND A WAY OUT .  WHICH HAS TRAPS WAITING TO CREATE A STIR FOR THE PLAYER. 

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
  •  A  - TURN  LEFT
  •  D  - TURN RIGHT
  •  ←   LEFT ARROW
  •  →   RIGHT ARROW
HOW  TO  PLAY

PLAYER MUST BE CAREFUL OF TRAPS. TAKE THR BALL TO PRESS THE LEVER AND  SIFT  THROUGH THE  COLORED HOOPS TO CHANGE THE CHARACTER COLOR FOR PASS  GO TO THE NEXT STAGE.

THIS IS PART OF A PROJECT COMMISSIONED BY THE UNIVERSITY 

THANK YOU FOR TAKING THE TIME TO PLAY. ❤

DOWNLOAD & INSTALL

Download File  : RoPuzzle_Demo.rar >> Extract File .rar >> Choose File  RoBall.exe   or  RoPuzzle.exe
